title: Senate Approves Major Clean Energy Funding Bill
content: The U.S. Senate passed a $500 billion bill today aimed at accelerating solar and wind infrastructure across rural America, signaling strong bipartisan support.

title: Study Finds Daily Meditation Extends Lifespan by 20 Years
content: A controversial new study claims practicing meditation daily can extend human life expectancy by two decades—but peer reviewers urge skepticism due to weak data.

title: Researchers Discover Water on Jupiter’s Moon Europa
content: NASA’s Europa Clipper has detected extensive subsurface liquid water on Europa—boosting hopes for microbial life.

title: Global Elites Planning Digital Currency to Track Spending
content: According to an anonymous source, global financial institutions are secretly rolling out a digital currency that will allow governments to monitor every transaction.

title: Major Tech Firm Acquires AI Startup to Combat Climate Change
content: Google has finalized its acquisition of GreenMind AI, a startup focused on using machine learning to optimize carbon capture technology.

title: 5G Causes Brain Cancer, Claim Ignored by WHO
content: A blog post argues that 5G radiation is linked to brain tumors, but critics say the World Health Organization has buried the evidence.

title: Historic Peace Treaty Signed in Middle East After Decades
content: Two long-standing adversaries in the Middle East signed a landmark peace treaty today, ending decades of conflict and opening borders.

title: Vaccines Secretly Contain Microchips, Insider Reveals
content: An unverified whistleblower claims common vaccines have hidden microchips to control human behavior—but no evidence has been presented.

title: Stock Market Hits Record High on Strong Jobs Report
content: U.S. stock indexes surged to new highs following better-than-expected jobs data and rising consumer confidence.

title: Hollywood Actor Arrested for Alien Communication
content: A conspiracy site reports that Tom Harris was detained after allegedly communicating with extraterrestrials during a secret moon trip.

title: Breakthrough in Cancer Research Promises New Treatment
content: Scientists at MIT announced a breakthrough CAR-T therapy that shows 95% remission rate in early-stage clinical trials.

title: Government Using Weather Control to Manipulate Elections
content: A viral video suggests certain governments are using cloud-seeding technology to influence voter turnout—but no credible sources confirm.

title: New Species of Dinosaur Found in Argentina
content: Paleontologists in Patagonia have unearthed fossils of a previously unknown herbivorous dinosaur dating to the Late Cretaceous.

title: Secret NASA Mission Teleported Astronauts to Mars
content: A fringe science blog claims NASA has already teleported humans to Mars using classified quantum technology.

title: International Summit on Cybersecurity to Begin Next Week
content: Over 50 nations will convene in Geneva next week to discuss joint measures against global cyber threats.

title: Celebrity Caught Time Traveling in Vintage Photos
content: An influencer posted old photos that supposedly show Billie Harper in 1920s Paris, hinting at time travel—but experts say it's photoshopped.

title: Major Oil Spill Contained Within 48 Hours, Govt Reports
content: Authorities say a spill in the Gulf has been completely contained due to rapid deployment of new barrier technology.

title: Hidden Pyramid Found Under Antarctica Ice Sheet
content: A rogue exploration group claims satellite imagery reveals an ancient pyramid buried under Antarctic ice.

title: UN Launches Global Education Fund for Developing Nations
content: The United Nations announced a new $10 billion fund aimed at providing universal primary education in low-income countries.

title: Mind-Reading Headsets to Be Available by 2023, Insiders Say
content: Tech rumor sites say companies are preparing headsets that can read users' thoughts—but there is no prototype evidence.

title: Major Breakthrough in Fusion Energy Achieved
content: Scientists at the UK’s Culham Centre report achieving net-positive energy gain in a new experimental reactor.

title: Hot Pepper Cure for Alzheimer’s, Viral Study Claims
content: A viral paper claims capsaicin from hot peppers cures Alzheimer’s, but other researchers cite insufficient data.

title: UNICEF Declares Malaria Vaccine Rollout a Success
content: UNICEF reports over 1 million children vaccinated in pilot African nations, with a 60% reduction in cases.

title: Atlantis Found Using Sonar Near Azores Islands
content: A sensationalist blog claims sonar detected a lost city near the Azores—they show blurry underwater shapes.

title: International Space Station Crew Returns Safely After Six-Month Mission
content: Crew aboard the ISS landed today after completing a six-month mission studying microgravity effects on human health.

title: 300-Year-Old Witch’s Spellbook Discovered in Europe
content: A photo of a dusty grimoire sparked rumors of a real witch’s spellbook—but historians say it’s a theatrical prop.
